title: Drawing, 1775–1800
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and gray wash on laid paper

Drawing, 1775–1800.
1775–1800. Pen and black ink, brush and gray wash on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-868.
